archimate:BusinessRole.name: Founding Steward
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: A Steward whose service to the Sovrin Network began by executing the Sovrin Founding Steward Agreement and hosting a Node under the first version of the Sovrin Governance Framework, formally called the Sovrin Provisional Trust Framework.
